long_description: Swift, smooth and responsive, the GT Karakoram Elite 29er Mountain Bike delivers solid performance with its 100mm RockShox fork, sure-stopping Avid hydro disc brakes and a snappy Shimano drivetrain. Butted aluminum frame features hydroformed top and down tubes to provide a strong, light and nimble ride for excellent trail handling. RockShox XC28 TK suspension fork supplies 100mm of travel with easy TurnKey lockout and rebound adjustment to smooth out rough trails. Shimano Alivio shifters, Deore XT Shadow rear derailleur and Shimano front derailleur snap you through the 27 gears to help you spin swiftly and comfortably. Avid DB 1 hydraulic disc brakes offer superb speed management, for tiny finesses or big, outright stops. Continental Race King tires offer great all-around traction. Replaceable rear derailleur hanger helps extend usable life of the frame. Specs on the GT Karakoram Elite 29er Mountain Bike are subject to change.
short_description: Swift, smooth and responsive, the GT Karakoram Elite 29er Mountain Bike delivers solid performance with its 100mm RockShox fork, sure-stopping Avid hydro disc brakes and a snappy Shimano drivetrain.
